  • Constructor Details

    • Theme

      public Theme(String theme)
      Constructor of the Theme.
      Parameters:
      theme - the name of the theme The id is based on the CID variable, nTopics is set as 0 and the topics array is set to the initial size

    • addTopic

      public boolean addTopic(Topic topic) throws TopicException
      Adds a Topic to the array topics[]
      Parameters:
      topic - - Topic to be added
      Returns:
      boolean, true if the topic was added, false otherwise
      Throws:
      TopicException - when the topic is null, or is repeated

    • addTopic

      public int addTopic(Topic[] topics) throws TopicException
      Adds an array of Topic[] to the array topics[]
      Parameters:
      topics - - array of Topic to be added
      Returns:
      x - number of topics successfully added
      Throws:
      TopicException - when there was an exception caught in adding

    • delTopic

      public boolean delTopic(Topic topic) throws TopicException
      Removes a Topic from the array topics[]
      Parameters:
      topic - - Topic to be removed
      Returns:
      boolean
      Throws:
      NullPointerException - If the given Topic is null There are no topic to remove Couldn't find the topic to remove
      TopicException

    • delTopic

      public int delTopic(Topic[] topics) throws TopicException
      Removes an array Topic[] from the array topics[]
      Parameters:
      topics - - array of Topic to be removed
      Returns:
      int - number of topics successfully removed
      Throws:
      TopicException - when there was an exception caught in removing
